title: Hood neoprene 5/7 mm for dry suit, M - Tecline

photos.alt: Kaptur neoprenowy 5/7 mm, do suchego kombinezonu (3) M - Tecline
Hood neoprene 5/7 mm for dry suit, M - Tecline

description:
Product description

- The 7mm neoprene in the main part of the hood gives a lot of warmth.

- The part that surrounds the face perfectly adheres to in and is made of 5mm neoprene.

- Labirynth valve does not stop gas in the hood at the exhalation of the nose.

 

Choose the right hood:

- with short collar: dry suits with neoprene orifice (version 5 / 7mm)

- with long collar: dry suits with latex orifice  / wet suits (5mm version)

 

 

ATTENTION!

Hood sizes are averaged. The correct size depends on the user's personal characteristics (head shape, hair length, etc.). We recommend trying on our hoods before buying.
